site_name: Land At Thameside West And Carlsberg Tetley, Dock Road,
description: Request for a Scoping Opinion in accordance with Regulation 15 of the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) (England) Regulations 2017 (as amended) in respect of the following development: Comprehensive mixed-use development of the site to provide up to 7,000 new homes along with a new primary school (four form entry), approximately 10,000m2 of industrial uses (B1c/B2/B8), 9,000m2 of B1 floor space under the arches of the Silvertown road flyover, 7,000m2 of retail/restaurant space (A1/A2/A3), and 3,000m2 designated for community purposes (D1/D2). Also included in the masterplan are the inclusion of new public realm spaces, including a park and enhancement of the designated nature reserve area (Site of Importance for Nature Conservation).
